sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2010/L.3), SBSTA: requests the EGTT, in undertaking these activities, to elaborate upon options for the operational modalities of the proposed TEC and TCN; endorses the TORs for a report by the EGTT on options to facilitate collaborative technology research and development; and agrees to bring forward the sixth regular meeting of the EGTT, which had been scheduled to take place in conjunction with SB 33, in order for the group to advance its work and finalize its reports in time for SB 33.
